import React, {useContext, useParams} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { FaHeart } from "react-icons/fa"; import { AuthContext } from '../store/context/AuthContext'; import axios from 'axios'; const MovieItem=({movie, media})=>{ const {user}=useContext(AuthContext) const {favourites}=useParams() const addToFavourites=(item)=>{ axios.put(`api/users/${user.id}/favourites`, item) .then(()=>alert('Added to your collection successfully')) .catch((err)=>console.log(err)) } return (
{user&& addToFavourites(movie)}/>}

{movie.original_title}

by Tomi

{movie.overview} More
Rank: <>{movie.vote_average}
Release Date: {movie.release_date}
) } export default MovieItem
